text.div:
Fluorescence In Situ Hybridization FISH Test for Acute Leukemia

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    51867-0 t(9;22)(q34.1;q11)(ABL1,BCR) fusion transcript in Blood or Tissue by FISH
    72827-9 dic(9;20)(p11-13;q11)(wcp9+,wcp20+) [Identifier] in Blood or Tissue by FISH Nominal
    77030-5 t(1;19)(q23.3;p13.3)(PBX1,TCF3) fusion transcript in Blood or Tissue by FISH
    77032-1 t(8;14)(q24;q32)(MYC,IGH) fusion transcript in Blood or Tissue by FISH
    77034-7 inv(16)(p13.1;q22.1)(MYH11,CBFB) fusion transcript in Blood or Tissue by FISH
    77039-6 t(12;21)(p13;q22.3)(ETV6,RUNX1) fusion transcript in Blood or Tissue by FISH
    77040-4 t(8;21)(q22;q22.3)(RUNX1T1,RUNX1) fusion transcript in Blood or Tissue by FISH
    81749-4 Chromosome region 13q14 deletion in Bone marrow by FISH
    81752-8 Chromosome region 1q21 duplication in Bone marrow by FISH
    84912-5 Cells.chromosome region 5q31 deletion/Cells counted in Bone marrow by FISH
